Package it.polimi.ingsw.client.view.cli.pages.subparts

Class SpecialCharacter

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.client.view.cli.pages.subparts.SpecialCharacter
public class SpecialCharacter extends Object
Class used for printing a single special character. It always returns to the starting point.
Author:
Matteo Negro

    • print

      public static org.fusesource.jansi.Ansi print(int id, int price, boolean active, Integer banNumber, Map<HouseColor,Integer> students)
      Print the special character.
      Parameters:
      id - Id of the special character.
      price - Price to activate the card.
      active - True whether the card has been paid, false otherwise.
      banNumber - Number of ban (-1, otherwise).
      students - Map of students on the card.
      Returns:
      The Ansi stream to print to terminal.
